#summary Developer's Guide - Component - Profiling

= Profiling =

== Overview ==

The Profiling component performs drive/computer recognization. It makes *Syncless* portable because of the ability to recognize different drives/computers by creating a Globally Unique IDentifier (GUID) in each of them. It also performs conversion from a physical drive/computer GUID to a logical ID.
